arts.ttl: GALLERY: It's festive fancy dress as Wigan Athletic fans enjoy their trip to Rotherham United!
arts.sum: Our man Bernard Platt was in and among the crowd at the New York Stadium as Wigan Athletic gave their supporters a belated Christmas present with three points at Rotherham United.

arts.ttl: REPORT: Rotherham United 0 Wigan Athletic 1 - Baba's maiden goal gives Tics a perfect Christmas present
arts.sum: Baba Adeeko's first goal in senior football gave Wigan Athletic and their supporters the perfect Christmas present with three points at Rotherham United.

arts.ttl: Babajide Adeekoâ€™s first career goal earns Wigan victory at Rotherham
arts.sum: Adeeko struck on the stroke of half-time.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Who makes our expected team v Rotherham United?
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start at Rotherham United on Boxing Day.

arts.ttl: Preview: Rotherham United vs. Wigan Athletic - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's League One clash between Rotherham United and Wigan Athletic, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic confirm key arrival in January
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic have secured their first - and possibly biggest - swoop of the January transfer window.
